rec.field: Landing page assembled from src components.
Test Charts Made by Image Engineering
We develop and manufacture high-precision test charts for professional image quality testing. Order directly from our shop now.
Meet us at the Automotive Imaging Forum
Join our engineers for a live workshop about VCX aligned camera testing.
Advanced testing workflows for every imaging challenge.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <T3FlexForms> <data> <sheet index="slides"> <language index="lDEF"> <field index="slideItems"> <value index="vDEF"> <el> <slide_1> <value index="ID">slide_1</value> <el> <name> <value index="vDEF">Laura Neumann</value> </name> <position> <value index="vDEF">Lead Optical Systems</value> </position> <quote> <value index="vDEF">I help you turn complex test setups into reliable, reproducible workflows.</value> </quote> <link> <value index="vDEF">https://www.image-engineering.de/contact</value> </link> <image> <value index="vDEF">fileadmin/user_upload/site-template/team-laura.jpg</value> </image> </el> </slide_1> <slide_2> <value index="ID">slide_2</value> <el> <name> <value index="vDEF">Markus Stein</value> </name> <position> <value index="vDEF">Senior Imaging Engineer</value> </position> <quote> <value index="vDEF">From sensor tuning to ISO and VCX complianceâ€”let's make your measurements future-proof.</value> </quote> <link> <value index="vDEF">https://www.image-engineering.de/contact</value> </link> <image> <value index="vDEF">fileadmin/user_upload/site-template/team-markus.jpg</value> </image> </el> </slide_2> <slide_3> <value index="ID">slide_3</value> <el> <name> <value index="vDEF">Aisha Rahman</value> </name> <position> <value index="vDEF">Image Quality Specialist</value> </position> <quote> <value index="vDEF">I focus on practical, automated pipelines for camera validation at scale.</value> </quote> <link> <value index="vDEF">https://www.image-engineering.de/contact</value> </link> <image> <value index="vDEF">fileadmin/user_upload/site-template/team-aisha.jpg</value> </image> </el> </slide_3> </el> </value> </field> </language> </sheet> </data> </T3FlexForms>
